display_long_description:
Step into the Magical World of Nedbakla Gallery!
Travel back to the year 1979 and enter the studio of the renowned surrealist Ladislav Guderna. Witness the creation of his mesmerizing masterpiece – "Balloons" – and immerse yourself in its vivid details.

Ladislav Guderna began exploring surrealist principles in the 1940s; however, his unique artistic expression fully developed in Canada, where he emigrated in 1968. Like most of his works, "Balloons" is distinguished by its technical precision. The shapes are painted with almost geometric accuracy, while bright colors and the cheerful motif of balloons evoke optimism and radiate the joyful atmosphere of a sunny day.

This artwork draws the viewer into a world of imagination, offering an escape from the reality of everyday life. Each brushstroke reveals hidden stories and rich symbolism, inviting you to explore the boundless creativity of Guderna's surrealist vision.

Discover a world where art comes alive and connect with the stories behind the canvas. Experience the beauty of Galéria Nedbalka in this immersive virtual reality journey.
